# AI Model DB

> The ultimate desktop application for tracking, managing, and validating AI models from multiple sources.

## Overview

AI Model DB is a cross-platform Electron desktop application that aggregates AI model information from multiple data sources (Hugging Face, Civitai, OpenModelDB, Artificial Analysis) into a unified, searchable database. It features LLM-powered validation, advanced filtering, and a beautiful modern UI.

## Key Features

- **Multi-Source Aggregation**: Sync models from Hugging Face, Civitai, OpenModelDB, and more
- **LLM-Powered Validation**: Use OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, or DeepSeek to validate and enrich model metadata
- **Advanced Filtering**: Filter by domain (LLM, ImageGen, Audio), license type, commercial usage, tags
- **Auto-Updates**: Built-in update notifications with one-click install
- **Secure Storage**: All API keys are encrypted locally; credentials never leave your machine
- **Beautiful UI**: Dark mode by default with customizable themes

## Installation

Download from: https://github.com/Jeremy8776/AIModelDB/releases

- Windows: AI-Model-DB-Setup.exe
- macOS: AI-Model-DB.dmg  
- Linux: AI-Model-DB.AppImage

## Technology Stack

- Electron (Desktop framework)
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Vite (Build tool)
- TailwindCSS (Styling)

## API Integrations

- Hugging Face API
- Civitai API
- OpenModelDB
- Artificial Analysis API
- OpenAI API (for validation)
- Anthropic API (for validation)
- Google AI API (for validation)
- DeepSeek API (for validation)
